title: Meeting Check-out
toast-details-update-failed: Failed to update checkout details. Please try again.
toast-meeting-not-ended: üïí Check-out is only available after the meeting ends.
toast-checkin-warning: Please check in before checking out!
toast-location-not-in-boundry: Current Location is not in boundary!
SETTINGS_row1_content: This extension enables users to check out from CRM meetings across both Web CRM and Mobile CRM. Check-out details are securely recorded within the meeting record using custom fields.
SETTINGS_row2_content: Check-out can be performed from the Meetings list view or the Meeting details page. A valid check-in through Mobile CRM is required, and check-out is allowed only after the meeting end time.
SETTINGS_NOTE_row1: For optimal results, please ensure accurate location details are provided.
SETTINGS_NOTE_row2: In some cases, location information may be approximate, which can affect distance-based validations.
SETTINGS_Time_NOTE_row1: Users can enable or disable the time-based restriction for check-out.
SETTINGS_Time_NOTE_row2: This setting controls whether users are allowed to check out before the meeting end time.
